metadata.title: CVE-2019-11065 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Gradle versions from 1.4 to 5.3.1 use an insecure HTTP URL to downloaddependencies when the built-in JavaScript or CoffeeScript Gradle pluginsare used. Dependency artifacts could have been maliciously compromised by aMITM attack against the ajax.googleapis.com web site.

criterions.comment: gradle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
